ZCL_OtauClusterServerAttributes_t Struct Reference

ZCL OTAU Cluster Server attributes. Currently, all attributes are client side attributes (only stored on the client). More...

Detailed Description

ZCL OTAU Cluster Server attributes. Currently, all attributes are client side attributes (only stored on the client).
